title: My ida.reg file got deleted, is there any way to restore ida?
content:
I Got IDA Pro license and for some reason ida.reg file from my home/.ida directory got deleted and now I just can't run ida and instead I get following displayed -

Is there any way to restore ida? Unfortunately, my support is expired.

answers_data.content: Fortunately it reappeared once I open ida64 in GUI mode!
